tweets.tweet: "the int'l city of peace & justice" welcomes @humdata & friends to cooperate + innovate for peace

tweets.tweet: Personally, I am quite happy to see that @humdata centre in The Hague will also focus on data literacy and policy! http://docs.humdata.org/designing-a-new-center-for-humanitarian-data/

tweets.tweet: Great to hear about the new UN Center for Humanitarian Data @humdata set to open in the Hague in 2017: http://docs.humdata.org/designing-a-new-center-for-humanitarian-data/
tweets.author: Science Practice

tweets.tweet: Diseñando un nuevo centro de datos humanitarios en La Haya http://docs.humdata.org/designing-a-new-center-for-humanitarian-data/ … vía @humdata #datos #cooperación
